definitions.text: a piece of dishware normally used as a container for holding or serving food
examples: we gave them a set of dishes for a wedding present

definitions.text: a particular item of prepared food
examples: she prepared a special dish for dinner

definitions.text: the quantity that a dish will hold
examples: they served me a dish of rice

definitions.text: a very attractive or seductive looking woman
directional antenna consisting of a parabolic reflector for microwave or radio frequency radiation
an activity that you like or at which you are superior
examples: chemistry is not my cup of tea
his bag now is learning to play golf
We serve meals for the homeless
She dished out the soup at 8 P.M.
The entertainers served up a lively show

definitions.text: make concave; shape like a dish
